documentation.text: @title TokenLockController. Contract for securely locking, unlocking, and burning tokens
@notice Requires caller to be in allowed list

@notice Add an allowed operator to the allowedOperators mapping
 @param _newOperator The address of the new operator to add

@notice Remove an allowed operator from the allowedOperators mapping
 @param _operator The address of the new operator to remove
@title TokenLockController. Contract for securely locking, unlocking, and burning tokens
@notice Requires caller to be in allowed list

@notice Add an allowed operator to the allowedOperators mapping
 @param _newOperator The address of the new operator to add

@notice Remove an allowed operator from the allowedOperators mapping
 @param _operator The address of the new operator to remove

params._newOperator: The address of the new operator to add

params._amount: The amount of the token to burn

lockFunds(address,uint256).details: Assumes that approval has already been given to this contract to transfer the ERC20 token

params._account: The address whose funds should be locked.
params._amount: The amount of the token to lock

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params._operator: The address of the new operator to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._account: The address whose funds should be unlocked.
params._amount: The amount of the token to lock
params._recipient: If set, will transfer unlocked funds to the address set. If not, will not do any transfers (useful for burning)

devdoc.title: TokenLockController. Contract for securely locking, unlocking, and burning tokens

addAllowedOperator(address).notice: Add an allowed operator to the allowedOperators mapping

burnFunds(uint256).notice: Burn funds that are held on this contract

lockFunds(address,uint256).notice: Lock funds to this contract's ledger

removeAllowedOperator(address).notice: Remove an allowed operator from the allowedOperators mapping

unlockFunds(address,uint256,address).notice: Unlock funds from this contract's ledger for a given user account and transfer to user
